item.description:
Are you new to the Law of Attraction? You may have heard or seen the popular movie "The Secret," which sparked your interest into thinking positive thoughts which will bring anything you want into creation, including:

Finding Financial Freedom

Manifesting True Love

Living a Better Fulfilling Life

Coming into Vibrational Alignment with the Energy of our Source.

Getting into the Vortex

Abraham reminds us that we are truly Source Energy and that a conscious connection to that Broader Non-Physical part of us is necessary if we are to be the joyful Beings.

Abraham calls that wonderful alignment; Abraham has helped us to understand that our dominant intent in every day is to get into the Vortex! And now, they have guided Jerry and Esther Hicks.

NOW, Wait a minute!!!

Manifesting, Source Energy, Alignment, Vortex

Who is Abraham - Esther and Jerry?

Let's get together to discuss this innovative principle based on Esther & Jerry Hicks book "Getting into the Vortex" which contains four basic areas of your life:

General Well-Being, Financial Well-Being, Physical Well-Being, and Relationships.

This Meet-up is Ideal for those who are new to The Law of Attraction and I welcome all experienced members to join me in guiding our newer members through knowledge and example.

Here is a link to Abraham-Hick website.
http://www.lawofattractioninteraction.com/meditation-cd.php

Join us in connecting with others who enjoy exploring endless possibilities, seeing all our experiences as a valuable life lesson and creating the change we desire.

We will be meet from 7:00pm-9:00pm.
See you there!
Please call for if you have any question.
Ellen
Organizer
617-750-4830

Â
item.how_to_find_us: There will be a Reserved spot for us in the Front. Near the Ordering Station

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: What is the Vortex & how do I get there?
